SELECT DISTINCT p.* FROM sys_permission p INNER JOIN sys_role_permission rp ON p.id = rp.permission_id INNER JOIN sys_user_role ur ON rp.role_id = ur.role_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} AND p.status = 1 AND p.deleted = 0 ORDER BY p.sort ASC
SELECT p.* FROM sys_permission p INNER JOIN sys_role_permission rp ON p.id = rp.permission_id WHERE rp.role_id = #{roleId} AND p.status = 1 AND p.deleted = 0 ORDER BY p.sort ASC
SELECT * FROM sys_permission WHERE parent_id = #{parentId} AND status = 1 AND deleted = 0 ORDER BY sort ASC
SELECT * FROM sys_permission WHERE status = 1 AND deleted = 0 ORDER BY parent_id ASC, sort ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sys_role_permission rp INNER JOIN sys_role r ON rp.role_id = r.id WHERE rp.permission_id = #{permissionId} AND r.deleted = 0
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sys_permission WHERE parent_id = #{parentId} AND deleted = 0
